about_the_game:
Combat Mission Red Thunder - Fire and Rubble is an add-on Module for Combat Mission Red Thunder that covers the final months of the titanic struggle on the Eastern front. The module spans geography from the Baltic coast to the very center of Berlin. Fight through all seasons from September 1944 to May of 1945. Battles from small infantry actions to the last of the sweeping tank battles in Europe are represented in both scenarios and campaigns.

Features

  • Numerous new forces are represented, Soviet partisans, Lend-Lease equipment, and 1945 relevant formations to the Soviet side.
  • German forces will now include Waffen SS, Kriegsmarine, Volkssturm and Luftwaffe branches as we bring the fight through the end of the war to Berlin.
  • 20 stand alone battles.
  • 2 full sized campaigns.
  • 3 “mini” campaigns

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.8 Ghz or equivalent speed AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM or better and must support 1024x768 or higher resolution in OpenGL ***IMPORTANT*** Not all Intel integrated video cards will play the game.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible Sound Card (Windows only)
  • Additional Notes: The game does not work in a virtualized environment (virtual machine)
